header.title: Team Projects
header.subtitle: Short links to tools, datasets, and publications

projects.title: Geoscientifc Notes
projects.description: Web-based platform to publish geoscience research and educational notes. Explore 'ALQUBALEE Notes' as an example.

projects.title: Lab Manager
projects.description: A web-based platform to manage research laboratories. This is an ongoing project, but its concept is currently operational at the Automated Mineralogy Lab.

projects.title: Local AI Platform
projects.description: A local generative AI platform designed for interaction with open-source AI models, enabling text, image, and audio generation

projects.title: MEGTScale
projects.description: Middle East Geologic Time Scale. This project is under active development by Dr. Moujahed Al-Husseini and Dr. Abdullah Alqubalee.
